sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: "#f1b29f",
    primaryLight: "#f8d5cb",
    primaryDark: "#e89a84",
    gray: {
      50: "#F9FAFB",
      100: "#F3F4F6",
      200: "#E5E7EB",
      300: "#D1D5DB",
      400: "#9CA3AF",
      500: "#6B7280",
      600: "#4B5563",
      700: "#374151",
      800: "#1F2937",
      900: "#111827",
    },
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: 4,
    sm: 8,
    md: 16,
    lg: 24,
    xl: 32,
    xxl: 48,
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: 4,
    md: 8,
    lg: 12,
    xl: 16,
    xxl: 24,
    full: 9999,
  },
  fontSizes: {
    xs: 12,
    sm: 14,
    md: 16,
    lg: 18,
    xl: 20,
    xxl: 24,
    xxxl: 32,
  },
}
